name: Melissa Nuckles
text: I went in for the first time and ordered the old fashioned pepperoni pizza and cheesy breadsticks.  It was absolutely delicious!! The pizza reminded me of Mountain Mike's Pizza because of the delicious pepperonis. My kids wanted seconds on everything.  Customer service was superb.  I will be going back.

name: Dema Lucien
text: Place is really clean and the restroom too. The guy at the counter was very nice and gave me a walkthrough of the specials. Parking sucks cause Popeye is next door and that place is good too. But I was surprised how clean that restroom was, â€¦More

name: Nathan Lee
text: If you are hungry and need a delivery, order early. I know it says open till 11, but they stop taking orders at 9:40. Great looking menu however.

name: O J
text: Pizza was hot and delivery was fast but too salty for my liking.

name: Mitsue Roldan
text: Our go to pizza in Moreno Valley! Always nice and hot, friendly service and great deals.

name: armando ruiz
text: pizza is really good and its the only place that when u tell them extra you can see the extra meet veggies or whatever you order. totally recommend

name: susy garcia
text: Delicious pizza, I totally recommend this place ðŸ‘Œ

name: Brandi Woods
text: Wow I really liked it!!!! The pizza was hot when I got it home...also the price was very cheap..Thank you for the cool service..;)

name: New structure Health
text: Just got a salad. After eating the salad I got the worst case of food poisoning every. Very upset about the experience and extremely sick. Places is not bad but with this happening I'm terrified to eat anything from this marcos.

name: Selene Amaton
text: I LOVE Marco's pizza, honestly I will not eat any other pizza, in my opinion it's really the best pizza to exist.

name: Donovan Robinson
text: This place is really nice and I love their food!

name: Daisy DeLao
text: This is the best pizza ever!! I am a pizza lover & this is my favorite!

name: Syliva Lopez
text:

name: Rich Rey
text: Pizza on par with Pizza Hut. Nothing Special. 2 stars for fast service.
